answers.answer: I would think as long as you ovulate you should be able to conceive. I myself am a full figured women and I didn't have trouble conceiving. This is my 6th time being pregnant. My trouble was keeping my babies in totally different story. I have one daughter per c section. Being large may complicate like high blood pressure,  diabetes things like that.
You will be fine. I am overweight and i am not big at all for 7 months but that's because he is just growing into my stomach. So i would say yes if you are ready.

question: Hi guys, was just wanting to know if any of the woman in here are pregnant and overweight or are vice versa. Any success stories with pregnancy and giving birth etc. I am wanting to know because I am a little overweight and would love to start TTC (Trying to conceive). But fear I'll be just because of this.
title: pregnancy & being overweight
